HERO_DESCRIPTION: FastComments provides the fastest to setup and use commenting system for both businesses and users, and you're on your way to a <u>30-day free trial</u>.
NOT_WEBSITE_LINK_TEXT: If you're not looking to add FastComments to a website you should sign up here.
FORM_DESCRIPTION: Now we just need some basic information, and then you can start installing FastComments.
USERNAME_PATTERN_TITLE: No special characters please - numbers and letters only.
EMAIL_DESCRIPTION_LOGGED_IN: We'll use your existing email. You can change it later from the account page if required.
EMAIL_DESCRIPTION: We'll send an email asking you to verify your account.
DOMAINS_HEADING: What is the address of your website where FastComments will show?
DOMAINS_DESCRIPTION: No need to input subdomains or localhost. For multiple sites, separate them with commas.
TOS_TEXT: By clicking Create Account, you agree to the Terms of Service.
